page.title: 13A FARMER'S SON'S DAY
page.content: This Kirkmichael boy is 12 years old. He gets up at 7a.m. dresses in his old clothes and goes out to feed lambs or calves.He then goes in,washes and has his breakfast. At 8.50a.m. he arrives at school.From 9 to 10.30a.m he does work.At playtime he plays computer games or goes out to the playground. Then from 10.45a.m. to 12 noon -school work which may be Maths or Language. The following hour is lunch and free time.From 1p.m. till 3.30p.m. more school activities with a break from 2.30 till 2.45.He then goes home by car and gets changed to do farm work.He brings cows into a shed,feeds lambs or calves and helps wash out the milking parlour. In summer he does field work which may be cutting silage or harvesting barley.
